author: Ewan Palmer
title: Dr. Desai Trends After Lambasting Trump Admin's 'Weak Response' to Coronavirus Pandemic on Fox News
description: Fox News host Martha MacCallum ends interview following criticism from chief medical officer at Osmosis.
content:
A doctor was praised after he criticized the government's "very weak response" to the coronavirus outbreak during an appearance on Fox News.
Dr. Rishi Desai, chief medical officer at Osmosis, could be seen continually shaking his head as Fox News host Martha… [+6877 chars]
